thread.title: Liam Payne apologises to fans and heads back on stage with One Direction
thread.title_full: Liam Payne apologises to fans and heads back on stage with One Direction

title: Liam Payne apologises to fans and heads back on stage with One Direction
text:
Liam Payne apologises to fans and heads back on stage with One Direction Liam Payne apologises to fans and heads back on stage with One Direction 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Liam Payne took to the stage alongside his One Direction band mates – the day after a concert had to be called off when he was taken ill. 
One Direction cancelled their concert in Belfast on October 20 at the very last minute, leaving fans confused, upset and concerned. Liam Payne (Charles Sykes/AP) 
But on October 21, representatives confirmed that evening’s show was still on, with the boys scheduled to perform an extra date on October 23 for the disappointed ticket-holders. 
And Liam joined band mates Louis Tomlinson, Harry Styles and Niall Horan on stage, to a warm reception from fans. 
Before the latest concert, Liam apologised on Twitter to worried fans for letting them down. I'm so sorry to everybody I disappointed last night. I'm feeling better now. I really hope everyone can make the rescheduled date on Friday.
